headline: Epic Fail? Morning Nets Largely Ignore Inflation Announcement – Again
author: Jeffrey Clark
sentences: This was the “largest 12-month increase” since December 1981.Energy inflation fared the worst at a shocking 32 percent rise over last year, with gasoline alone rising 48 percent.
The NBC, CBS and ABC morning news shows largely ignored a new inflation report that showed inflation raging at 8.5 percent.
That was the highest increase since 1981 — the same year Raiders of the Lost Ark hit the box office.
ET April 12 that inflation increased by a terrifying 8.5 percent over the past year.
Food inflation also took a steep hike at 8.8 percent.
The Bureau of Labor Statistics reported at 8:30 a.m.
